Name: Splotches
About the game: Splotches is a tricksy puzzle game about exploding paint. Mix together the primary colors red, yellow, and blue in any order to make a Brownsplosion. Spread the colors across conveyor belts, through portals, over filters, and into buckets on your quest to destroy the mythical Rainbow Orb. Includes over 100 spluzzles, and a spluzzle maker!
